episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Community-Controlled Infrastructure
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Community-Controlled Infrastructure.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down SD73 adds new accessible school bus to increase equitable field trip transportation and I embedded myself in a vibe coding team at Gemini's AI hackathon in Singapore. Building an app in 7 hours takes real work., plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into community-controlled infrastructure, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
